entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 16.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 07:00 AM EDT Saturday 28 May 2016
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 16.0°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 15.2°C
Wind: E 14 km/h gust 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 24. POP 60%
entry.summary: Showers ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm. Fog patches dissipating this morning. High 24. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 28 May 2016

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers and risk of a thunderstorm. Fog patches developing this evening. Low 15. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Saturday 28 May 2016
